Reviews.Title: A Great, Inexpensive, Unlocked Android Phone.
Reviews.Author: PR58TP5784
Reviews.Content: I was looking for something to replace my old Android 2.3 phone but didn't want to spend alot; plus, I wanted to stick with prepaid service and have the freedom to switch carriers as prices for data changes. This phone was my choice. Having used it for a few days I think it's was well worth the 149.99. It is definitely cheaper plastic construction, but still feels solid at the same time having a decent weight to it. If you're looking for a super light phone you'll want to look elsewhere. The screen looks great and is fast and responsive. The near-stock Android Jellybean runs nicely and the quad-core processor handles most tasks with ease. Camera could be better. Blu includes a silicone case in the box which you'll need because it is super slippery without it. It also comes with a screen protector, headphones, USB cable, and wall adapter.This is a smart alternative to spending a ton of money for a name brand Android phone or getting locked into contracts.

Reviews.Title: This mobile phone highly exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: M. Ortega
Reviews.Content: I was not sure about the quality of the device because is not a premium brand, but I am pleasantly surprised by the fluidity and great user experience.The phone don't have a proprietary interface like Touchwiz o Sense (comes with vanilla android) and the management of the two sims is extremely simple. The screen is big, bright and colorful and the phone feels good in hand but is a bit heavy.Pros:-Vanilla Android-Large screen with good viewing angles and excellent color-It works fast and smooth-Dual simCons:-The camera is not very good quality-It's a little bit heavyIn conclusion it's a purchase where you get much for the price you pay.

Reviews.Title: good bargain!!
Reviews.Author: carlos castellanos
Reviews.Content: blu is not a known brand but its newer products are very good in quality and performance, and cost half of what u would pay for a similar brand phone. i also got a blu life and i think that phone is better than samsung's galaxy i9300 s3. would recommend this phone

Reviews.Title: Great smartphone for the price!
Reviews.Author: CINDY BRUTON
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for the price. I have straight talk and it works perfectly. They didn't tell me this, but at first the data internet and picture messaging would not work until I reset the APN settings. I downloaded the app Tweaker from google play and it gave me all the APN setting needed in order for the data and the MMS to work. Once it's set, then everything works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous phone and no bloatware!
Reviews.Author: tater
Reviews.Content: Processing speed is fine.  Battery life is good.  Large, clear display.  Comes with all the accessories you will need--screen protectors, charger (inc. USB cable), protective case, headphones.  Crystal clear sound.  Easy to set up as wifi hotspot or tether.  It has all the apps you need and nothing that you don't need.  I've had it for a month and it has worked without any problems whatsoever.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone
Reviews.Author: Charlotte McRae
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone.  It has everything you need and is very easy to use. I bought it to use on Straight Talk and it works great. The only thing I would like to get is a little more substantial case for it.  Overall, I would highly recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: over all not good
Reviews.Author: Rutha Egzeher "rutha eg"
Reviews.Content: it does not function properly have lots of issues freezes a lot, cuts of in the middle of my calls it should't be in the market as a smart phone at all

Reviews.Title: Does not work properly, support sucks!
Reviews.Author: Markus
Reviews.Content: The phone did not work right from the beginning, lot's of trouble. I have to turn it off and back on twice a day, otherwise the functions (like camera, apps etc) don't work. Customer service only advised to hard reset (what caused every time to setup everything from scratch). Recently customer support did not respond anymore. SO I have to buy a new phone, but certainly not from this company!

Reviews.Title: Best price/value low cost phone
Reviews.Author: Pablo Jose Olivares Galindez "PJOG"
Reviews.Content: This phone hace a real good price/value relation. It is a little slow sometimes. The creen es decent. The audio output connector have low volume

Reviews.Title: A big thank you!
Reviews.Author: Katherine Melo
Reviews.Content: I was really afraid of buying a phone on Amazon. But after reading your good reviews and ratings I said why not risk purchasing a phone from you. I've had my phone for exactly a week and I LOVE IT! Since its unlocked I was afraid it wasn't going to be able to be activated, which definitely wasn't the case. This phone is refurbished but yet looks brand new. It came with a new screen protector, case, charger and phone box. I love the size, it's about half an inch taller than the Galaxy 4s. I've received many compliments! I'm one happy customer. Thank you for gaining my trust and loyalty.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Tenika H.
Reviews.Content: great phone got it for my friend in Trinidad she loves the fact that it has double sim cards so she does not have to switch phones.

Reviews.Title: Not A Very good phone.0 stars
Reviews.Author: Robert C.
Reviews.Content: Phone Somehow Cracked inside a pouch on my hip.cant use the phone because its inside the glass.wont allow you to turn phone on.theres no warranty on defective phone.am required to pay cost of $80. including shipping to repair.no i do not recommend this phone.no warranty on item.

Reviews.Title: Best concept
Reviews.Author: Ethan Foster
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone if you travel internationally frequently. While in the USA I use Tmobile SIM with the ability to add an additional SIM for my destination. While overseas This phone is all I need to be fully connected to the world.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: John Vanwinkle
Reviews.Content: Very excellent device, does everything the description advertises. Excellent battery life and great performance, nice responsive touch screen, with beautiful display.

Reviews.Title: Has Problems
Reviews.Author: Kenneth George-Dill
Reviews.Content: This Phone drops calls, cuts off, freezes and is insensitive to touch, not a good buy, it needs some improvement before it can be successful.For now I do not recommend buying it.

Reviews.Title: ridiculous
Reviews.Author: Samara black
Reviews.Content: broke after three weeks. and whenever i put my headphones in it would turn off. i am so disappointed and angry.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: CARSAMACH
Reviews.Content: It is like samsung S4. The applications functioning very well. At the first moment I don't like it because I am expected a screen smaller. Howeve, right now  I am enjoying have a big screen with me. The price is too low compared with the benefits that you can enjoy if you decided to buy it.
